v8:item.v8:content: Group web client extension not set
The extension for digital signature and encryption is not installed into Internet Explorer. You can not check which applications are installed on the computer.
Settings of digital signatures and encryption apps that users can use on their computers:

Check signatures and certificates on server

It allows you not to install the application to the user computer to check digital signatures and certificates.
Important: at least one of the applications from the list must be installed on each computer with working 1C:Enterprise server or Web server which uses a file infobase.

It allows you not to install the application and the certificate on the computer of the user for signing, encryption and decryption.
Important: the application and the private key certificate must be installed on each computer with working 1C:Enterprise server or Web server which uses a file infobase.
